PART_TILT_DESCRIPTION: This sensor detects the degree of tilt the robot experiences
PART_TILT_PIN_OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION: When this part is powered, this pin will output the degree of tilt. If the robot is not tilted, the output will be halfway between <low> and <high>. When the robot is rotated 90 degrees to the left, the output will be <low>. When the robot is rotated 90 degrees to the right, the output will be <high>. When the part is not powered, the output will be <low>.
